title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the process fails. Additional details are needed to investigate and address the issue.
OB: Synchronization failure when attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully update both the selected .java file and the associated resource (e.g., .properties file) in the package viewer.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
